    CANbus_Controller
     
    CANbusDataReader
     
    Driver
    This Interface represent an abstraction layer that allows to send/receive bytes to/from the connected devices.
    The Driver manage the interaction with the given hardware peripheral connected to the host device.
    Notifiable
     
    Protocol
    LEVEL 1 contains all the methods in order to control the interaction with the given device connected to the host via one of the supported hardware peripheral.
    Two known Protocol are used at moment: the RS232 and the CANbus.
    This Protocol is an abstraction layer that allows to interact with any of the supported device via the given hardware peripheral.
